name: Coloski
description:
A sliding puzzle designed around the colour blind. Move tiles into their correct location to finish the puzzle, like regular sliding puzzle games, but this time you can move around the puzzle, but you can't move a tile you are currently standing on. This means you have to think about where you are standing and how you are going to navigate the maze of walls whilst also trying to get each tile to where it belongs.

This game was designed for one of my university assignments, where the objective was the create a game based on a specific disability. 

It also uses ColorADD to help convey colour information.

Made in Unity
